name: Abyss Script - Rise of the Dark Ruler
desc: Target face-up cards on the field, up to the number of Attack Position "Abyss Actor" monsters with different names you control; destroy them. If you control a Level 7 or higher "Abyss Actor" monster, your opponent cannot activate cards or effects in response to this effect's activation. If this Set card in its owner's control is destroyed by an opponent's card effect while you have a face-up "Abyss Actor" Pendulum Monster(s) in your Extra Deck: You can add up to 2 "Abyss Actor" cards and/or "Abyss Script" Spell Cards with different names from your Deck to your hand.

name: Altar of the Darklords
desc: Special Summon 1 "Darklord" or "Fallen One" monster from your Graveyard in Defense Position. You can only activate 1 "Altar of the Darklords" per turn.

name: Abyss Script - Opening Ceremony
desc: Gain 500 LP for each "Abyss Actor" monster you control. If this Set card in its owner's control is destroyed by an opponent's card effect while you have a face-up "Abyss Actor" Pendulum Monster(s) in your Extra Deck: You can draw until you have 5 cards in your hand. You can only use each effect of "Abyss Script - Opening Ceremony" once per turn.

name: Abyss Actor - Pretty Heroine
desc:
Pendulum Scale = 2
[ Pendulum Effect ]
Once per turn, when you take battle damage by an opponent's attacking monster: You can activate 1 of these effects;
● That opponent's monster loses ATK equal to the battle damage you took (even if this card leaves the field).
● Add 1 face-up "Abyss Actor" Pendulum Monster from your Extra Deck to your hand with ATK less than or equal to the battle damage you took.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
Once per turn, when a player takes battle damage: You can target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; it loses ATK equal to the battle damage that player took. When this card is destroyed by battle, or when this card in its owner's Monster Zone is destroyed by an opponent's card effect: You can Set 1 "Abyss Script" Spell Card directly from your Deck.

name: Darklord Mastema
desc: If this card is in your hand: You can discard 2 other "Darklord" and/or "Fallen One" cards; Special Summon this card. During either player's turn: You can pay 1000 LP, then target 1 "Darklord" Spell/Trap Card in your Graveyard; this effect becomes that target's effect when that card is activated, then shuffle that target into the Deck. You can only use this effect of "Darklord Mastema" once per turn. You can only Special Summon "Darklord Mastema(s)" once per turn.

name: Darklord Lucifer
desc: Cannot be Special Summoned. If this card is Tribute Summoned: You can Special Summon "Darklord" and/or "Fallen One" monsters from your hand and/or Deck, up to the number of Effect Monsters your opponent controls. While you control another "Darklord" or "Fallen One" monster, your opponent cannot target this card with card effects. Once per turn: You can send cards from the top of your Deck to the Graveyard, equal to the number of "Darklord" and "Fallen One" monsters on the field, and if you do, gain 500 LP for each "Darklord" and "Fallen One" card sent to the Graveyard by this effect.

name: Abyss Actor - Superstar
desc:
Pendulum Scale = 3
[ Pendulum Effect ]
Once per turn: You can Tribute 1 "Abyss Actor" monster, then target 1 "Abyss Script" Spell Card in your Graveyard; add it to your hand.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
When this card is Normal or Special Summoned, your opponent cannot activate Spell/Trap Cards or their effects. Once per turn: You can Set 1 "Abyss Script" Spell Card directly from your Deck, but send it to the Graveyard during the End Phase.

name: D - Fusion
desc: Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using "Destiny HERO" monsters you control as Fusion Materials, and if you do, it cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects this turn.

name: Destiny HERO - Dark Angel
desc: If you have 3 or more "Destiny HERO" monsters in your Graveyard: You can discard this card, then target 1 "Destiny HERO" monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon it to your opponent's field in Defense Position. Each time a Spell Card that was activated on your field resolves, negate its effect, and if you do, destroy it. During your Standby Phase: You can banish this card and 1 "Destiny HERO" monster from your Graveyard; both players choose 1 Normal Spell Card from their Deck and place them on top of their Decks.
str3: Place Normal Spell on top of the Deck
str4: Select a card to place on top of the Deck

name: Destiny HERO - Dynamiteguy
desc: When a monster battles, during damage calculation (in either player's turn): You can discard this card; make the battle damage you take from this battle 0, and if you do, inflict 1000 damage to both players. You can banish this card from your Graveyard, then target 1 "Destiny HERO" monster you control; it gains 1000 ATK until the end of your opponent's next turn.

name: Abyss Script - Abode of the Fire Dragon
desc: Target 1 "Abyss Actor" monster you control; this turn, if it destroys an opponent's monster by battle, your opponent banishes 3 monsters from their Extra Deck. If this Set card in its owner's control is destroyed by an opponent's card effect while you have a face-up "Abyss Actor" Pendulum Monster(s) in your Extra Deck: You can look at your opponent's Extra Deck, also banish 1 card from their Extra Deck. You can only use this effect of "Abyss Script - Abode of the Fire Dragon" once per turn.

name: Darklords Falling from Grace
desc: Send 1 "Darklord" or "Fallen One" monster from your hand or face-up from your field to the Graveyard; destroy 1 card on the field. You can only activate 1 "Darklords Falling from Grace" per turn.

name: Abyss Actor - Sassy Rookie
desc:
Pendulum Scale = 2
[ Pendulum Effect ]
If an "Abyss Actor" monster(s) you control would be destroyed by battle or an opponent's card effect, you can destroy this card instead.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
The first time this card would be destroyed by battle or card effect each turn, it is not destroyed. If this card is destroyed by battle, or if this card in its owner's Monster Zone is destroyed by an opponent's card effect: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Abyss Actor" monster from your Deck, except "Abyss Actor - Sassy Rookie". If this card in the Pendulum Zone is destroyed: You can target 1 Level 4 or lower monster your opponent controls; destroy it.

name: Abyss Actor - Wild Hope
desc:
Pendulum Scale = 2
[ Pendulum Effect ]
Once per turn: You can target 1 "Abyss Actor" card in your other Pendulum Zone; its Pendulum Scale becomes 9 until the end of this turn, also you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except "Abyss Actor" monsters (even if this card leaves the field).
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
Once per turn: You can make this card gain 100 ATK for each "Abyss Actor" monster with different names you currently control, until the end of this turn. If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can add 1 "Abyss Actor" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Abyss Actor - Wild Hope". You can only use this effect of "Abyss Actor - Wild Hope" once per turn.

name: Darklord Amdusias
desc: You can discard this card and 1 "Darklord" or "Fallen One" card, then target 1 "Darklord" or "Fallen One" card in your Graveyard; add it to your hand. During either player's turn: You can pay 1000 LP, then target 1 "Darklord" Spell/Trap Card in your Graveyard; this effect becomes that target's effect when that card is activated, then shuffle that target into the Deck. You can only use each effect of "Darklord Amdusias" once per turn. You can only Special Summon "Darklord Amdusias(s)" once per turn.

name: Abyss Actor - Evil Heel
desc:
Pendulum Scale = 1
[ Pendulum Effect ]
Once per turn: You can Tribute 1 "Abyss Actor" monster you control, then target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; it loses ATK equal to the Tributed monster's original ATK, until the end of this turn (even if this card leaves the field).
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; it loses 1000 ATK for each "Abyss Actor" monster you currently control, until the end of this turn. When this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle: You can target 1 "Abyss Script" Spell Card in your Graveyard; Set it to your field.

name: Darklord Ixtab
desc: You can discard this card and 1 "Darklord" or "Fallen One" card; draw 2 cards. During either player's turn: You can pay 1000 LP, then target 1 "Darklord" Spell/Trap Card in your Graveyard; this effect becomes that target's effect when that card is activated, then shuffle that target into the Deck. You can only use each effect of "Darklord Ixtab" once per turn. You can only Special Summon "Darklord Ixtab(s)" once per turn.

name: Entering the Abyss Actor Dressing Room
desc: If you have 2 "Abyss Actor" cards in your Pendulum Zones: Add 2 "Abyss Actor" Pendulum Monsters with different names from your Deck to your Extra Deck face-up. You can only activate 1 "Entering the Abyss Actor Dressing Room" per turn.

name: Destiny HERO - Celestial
desc: When this card declares an attack: You can target 1 face-up Spell Card your opponent controls; destroy it, and if you do, inflict 500 damage to your opponent. If you have no cards in your hand, except the turn this card was sent to the Graveyard: You can banish this card and 1 "Destiny HERO" monster from your Graveyard; draw 2 cards. You can only use this effect of "Destiny HERO - Celestial" once per turn.

name: Destiny HERO - Decisionguy
desc:
Level 6 or higher monsters your opponent controls cannot target this card for attacks. You can only use each of these effects of "Destiny HERO - Decisionguy" once per Duel.
● If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "HERO" monster from your Graveyard to your hand during the End Phase of this turn.
● During either player's turn, when a card or effect is activated that would inflict damage to you while this card is in your Graveyard: Add this card to your hand, and if you do, make that effect damage to you 0.

name: Abyss Stage Prop - Escape Stage Coach
desc: The first time each "Abyss Actor" monster you control would be destroyed by battle each turn, it is not destroyed. Once per turn: You can target 1 "Abyss Actor" monster you control; it cannot be targeted by your opponent's card effects until the end of your opponent's turn (even if this card leaves the field). If this Set card in its owner's control is destroyed by an opponent's card effect while you have a face-up "Abyss Actor" Pendulum Monster(s) in your Extra Deck: You can return all cards your opponent controls to the hand.

name: Casting out the Darklords
desc: Add 1 "Darklord" or "Fallen One" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Casting out the Darklords". You can only activate 1 "Casting out the Darklords" per turn.

name: Abyss Script - Fantasy Magic
desc: Target 1 "Abyss Actor" monster you control; this turn, if it battles a monster, but the monster was not destroyed by the battle, return that monster to the hand at the end of the Damage Step. If this Set card in its owner's control is destroyed by an opponent's card effect while you have a face-up "Abyss Actor" Pendulum Monster(s) in your Extra Deck: You can target 1 card your opponent controls; place it on the top of the Deck.

name: Darklords' Temptation
desc: Send 1 "Darklord" or "Fallen One" monster from your hand or face-up from your field to the Graveyard; take control of 1 face-up monster your opponent controls until the End Phase. You can only activate 1 "Darklords' Temptation" per turn.

name: Darklord Tezcatlipoca
desc: If a "Darklord" or "Fallen One" monster(s) you control would be destroyed by battle or card effect while this card is in your hand, you can discard this card instead. During either player's turn: You can pay 1000 LP, then target 1 "Darklord" Spell/Trap Card in your Graveyard; this effect becomes that target's effect when that card is activated, then shuffle that target into the Deck. You can only use this effect of "Darklord Tezcatlipoca" once per turn. You can only Special Summon "Darklord Tezcatlipoca(s)" once per turn.

name: Abyss Actor - Extra
desc:
Pendulum Scale = 3
[ Pendulum Effect ]
If your opponent controls a monster: You can Special Summon this card from your Pendulum Zone. You can only use this effect of "Abyss Actor - Extra" once per turn.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
You can Tribute this card; place 1 "Abyss Actor" Pendulum Monster from your Deck in your Pendulum Zone, also you cannot Special Summon monsters except "Abyss Actor" monsters, nor activate the Pendulum Effect of "Abyss Actor - Extra", for the rest of this turn. You can only use this effect of "Abyss Actor - Extra" once per turn.

name: Destiny HERO - Dystopiaguy
desc:
2 "Destiny HERO" monsters
If this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 Level 4 or lower "Destiny HERO" monster in your Graveyard; inflict damage to your opponent equal to its ATK. During either player's turn, if this card's current ATK is different from its original ATK: You can target 1 card on the field; destroy it, and if you do, this card's ATK becomes equal to its original ATK. You can only use each effect of "Destiny HERO Dystopiaguy" once per turn.

name: Destiny HERO - Drillguy
desc: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Destiny HERO" monster from your hand with ATK less than or equal to this card's. You can only use this effect of "Destiny HERO - Drillguy" once per turn. If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent.

name: D3
desc:
If this card is Normal Summoned: It is treated as a "Destiny HERO" monster while it is on the field. You can only use each of these effects of "D3" once per turn.
● You can discard up to 2 cards; Special Summon the same number of "D3" from your hand, Deck, and/or Graveyard, also you cannot Normal or Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except "Destiny HERO" monsters.
● If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can send 1 "Destiny HERO" monster from your Deck to the Graveyard.

name: Abyss Actor - Funky Comedian
desc:
Pendulum Scale = 8
[ Pendulum Effect ]
Once per turn: You can Tribute 1 "Abyss Actor" monster, then target 1 "Abyss Actor" monster you control; it gains ATK equal to the Tributed monster's original ATK, until the end of this turn (even if this card leaves the field).
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can make this card gain 300 ATK for each "Abyss Actor" monster you currently control until the end of this turn. You can target 1 other "Abyss Actor" monster you control; it gains ATK equal to this card's current ATK until the end of this turn. You can only use this effect of "Abyss Actor - Funky Comedian" once per turn. This card cannot attack the turn this effect is activated.
